title: Texto
author: Texto
content: Looking for 150 usdt loan, will pay in 2 months

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: You want a $150 loan. You have to make your loan request detailed, including how you want to pay it back and the kind of collateral you have to present. Collateral is what will make anyone give you a quick approval for your loan based on the level of your account.Edit: You account has been long sleeping your last post was last December 2020, and your first post today was a loan request?? Well, if you can offer valid collateral that can cover your loan repayment if you default, then those might not be looked at.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: Quote from: Nwada001 on June 06, 2023, 06:16:30 AMYou want a $150 loan. You have to make your loan request detailed, including how you want to pay it back and the kind of collateral you have to present. Collateral is what will make anyone give you a quick approval for your loan based on the level of your account.Edit: You account has been long sleeping your last post was last December 2020, and your first post today was a loan request?? Well, if you can offer valid collateral that can cover your loan repayment if you default, then those might not be looked at.Op has a very slim chance to be accepted. Besides I think loan are likely given to those that are in a campaign or have something doing here in forum, maybe that offers services to people so that after they get paid for their job they will pay back their loan. Secondly his account is member rank so I strongly have this feelings that op might not get accepted for a loan because is not a reputable member. There are other factors lender's may consider which I can't say it all.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Quote from: Adbitco on June 06, 2023, 07:45:05 AMOp has a very slim chance to be accepted. Besides I think loan are likely given to those that are in a campaign or have something doing here in forum, maybe that offers services to people so that after they get paid for their job they will pay back their loan. Secondly his account is member rank so I strongly have this feelings that op might not get accepted for a loan because is not a reputable member. There are other factors lender's may consider which I can't say it all.Being in a signature or having a higher-ranking account is only most times needed if the person wants to apply for a non-collateral loan. Those are a little bit convincing that the person will pay back, but it's not a guarantee; a loan defaulter will always be one.But if the OP has valid collateral that is even higher than the requested loan amount, then the lender doesn't have anything to worry about because the collateral, if it's in any coin, will be deposited either in the lender's wallet or in an escrow account that will guarantee repayment, and if repayment is not made, then the collateral will be sold to recover the loaned amount. It's as simple as that in such a scenario, a high-ranking account or being in the signature is actually not needed to get a higher chance of getting approved.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Quote from: Texto on June 06, 2023, 06:07:28 AMLooking for 150 usdt loan, will pay in 2 monthsYour activity is quite suspicious, how does an account that just woke up today makes his first post in the lending board looking for someone that will give them a loan.Op I can assure that they are no Santa Claus here in the forum so you won't see anyone who would risky losing $150 usdt to an account with a high possibility of never coming back to the forum once they finally get the loan.According to seclog, your account wole up and reset the password via Email today. Did you specifically just log into this account so that you can request for a loan?

comments.author: CYBER_COWBOY
comments.body: I have to agree with previous members, its very hard for you to find a loan when you don´t have more feedback or are active in a campaign.Also that your password was reset recently & you woke up from a long period of inactivity does not make anything easier.I learned that the hard way that you don´t should give a loan to a person with low rank that not are in a campaign.I think it´s better if you just use this forum as a forum and search for a loan elsewhere. Good luck!

comments.author: Mpamaegbu
comments.body: Quote from: Cantsay on June 06, 2023, 09:52:29 AMAccording to seclog, your account wole up and reset the password via Email today. Did you specifically just log into this account so that you can request for a loan?You took the word out of my mouth. That sudden wake up evidence doesn't look nice on the OP at all, even if their intention were genuine. Those who run loan services here know how to sniff these things out (even if we don't say it here) but I doubt if they even have any considerations for noob accounts asking for their services, let alone an account that suddenly woke up.
